title: Ruler's Desire
description: Davran returns to her place of birth in this sequel to 'Fuel to the Fire' to find her father leading the beginnings of a revolution. She is determined to join the attempt to overthrow the tyrannical ruler Saurian, even if it means dying for the cause. First they must recruit more people; convince them that dying while fighting for life is not suicide. But after spending her entire fifteen years disguised as a boy, she is even more determined to do so as a woman. Prophesy, it seems, has given her little choice in the matter.
author: David Staniforth
